title: Riders Turn Wrong Way (Again), This Time in Finale at Faun-Ardèche
content:
Romain Grégoire wins the Faun-Ardèche Classic after leaders take the wrong turn in a chaotic repeat of Algarve fiasco last month.

Read the full article at Riders Turn Wrong Way (Again), This Time in Finale at Faun-Ardèche on Velo.
author: ahood
